name: Acute Clinic
description:
Created for Ludum Dare game jam 35 (theme: shapeshift) with Lady Beardo.

Want to help people shift that shape in the center of their face? Then visit Dr. Acute's Aesthetic Medicine Clinic. You play as the doctor. You want to help your clients and make them happy, but paying the bills is also important. But when a client wants the works, those objectives might not be competing!

Greet clients and walk them through their options-- listen to their feedback--but it's up to you what kind of procedure you perform.

Everyone wants to be acute triangle!
